summary: A 20th Century pilot named Buck Rogers and his young friend Buddy Wade awake from 500 years in suspended animation to find that the world has been taken over by the outlaw army of Killer Kane.
cast: Buster Crabbe|Constance Moore|Jackie Moran|Jack Mulhall|Anthony Warde|Philson Ahn|C. Montague Shaw|Guy Usher|William Gould|Henry Brandon|Kenne Duncan|Reed Howes|Wheeler Oakman|Carleton Young|Roy Barcroft|Wade Boteler|Al Bridge|Roy Butler|Eddy Chandler|Lane Chandler|Russ Clark|James Contay|Cyril Delevanti|Frank Ellis|Jack Gardner|Karl Hackett|Kenneth Harlan|John Harmon|Ben Lewis|Theodore Lorch|Frank O'Connor|Stanley Price|Francis Sayles|David Sharpe|Tom Steele
keywords: suspended animation|25th century|spacecraft|space travel|good versus evil
director: Directors: Ford Beebe (uncredited), Saul A. Goodkind (uncredited)
title: Planet Outlaws
